title: Sound 1: /a/ (ا)
description: Listen first, then spot the shape for the very first Arabic sound.
objective: Help children hear and repeat the /a/ sound while matching it to the isolated shape.

activities.prompt: Play the sound. Tap the shape that matches /a/.
Which shape goes with the open mouth sound /a/?
Listen again, then repeat /a/ out loud with Shibl's animation.
